p.k: Getting into Mexico makes the team nervous because they hear more and more stories about drug wars along the US border. Exactly in that danger zone they get stuck at night with a broken shock absorber. Various other delays build up serious time pressure to attend a major press conference in Mexico City. Eventually the team starts to relax and accepts a certain unpredictability. They get stuck in a bus strike in Oaxaca, visit a huge wind farm in La Ventosa and get welcomed by a heavily armed police escort at the border of Guatemala.
